TEXT.TITLE: E.F. HUTTON GROUP INC <EFH> NAMES EXECUTIVE
TEXT.BODY: E.F. Hutton Group Inc said it named Jerry Welsh to the newly-created post of senior executive vice president for marketing and strategic development. The company said Welsh was previously executive vice president of worldwide marketing and communications for American Express'<AXP> Travel Related Services Co Inc. Reuter
